batchGetAttestationStats(bytes32[]).return: [0] Array of number of matching accounts per identifier.[1] Array of sum([0]) matching walletAddresses.[2] Array of sum([0]) numbers indicating the completions for each account.[3] Array of sum([0]) numbers indicating the total number of requested attestations for each account.

params.blsKey: The BLS public key that the validator is using for consensus, should pass proof  of possession. 48 bytes.
params.blsPop: The BLS public key proof-of-possession, which consists of a signature on the  account address. 96 bytes.
params.sender: The address signed by the BLS key to generate the proof of possession.

complete(bytes32,uint8,bytes32,bytes32).details: Throws if there is no matching outstanding attestation request.Throws if the attestation window has passed.

params.identifier: The hash of the identifier for this attestation.
params.r: Output value r of the ECDSA signature.
params.s: Output value s of the ECDSA signature.
params.v: The recovery id of the incoming ECDSA signature.

fractionMulExp(uint256,uint256,uint256,u.return: numerator/denominator of the computed quantity (not reduced).

getAttestationIssuers(bytes32,address).return: Addresses of the selected attestation issuers.

getAttestationState(bytes32,address,addr.return: [          Status of the attestation,          Block number of request/completion the attestation,          Address of the token with which this attestation request was paid for        ]

getAttestationStats(bytes32,address).return: [Number of completed attestations, Number of total requested attestations]

getCompletableAttestations(bytes32,addre.return: ( blockNumbers[] - Block number of request/completion the attestation,          issuers[] - Address of the issuer,          stringLengths[] - The length of each metadataURL string for each issuer,          stringData - All strings concatenated        )

getEpochSize().return: The current epoch size in blocks.

getUnselectedRequest(bytes32,address).return: [          Block number at which was requested,          Number of unselected requests,          Address of the token with which this attestation request was paid for        ]

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

numberValidatorsInCurrentSet().return: Size of the current elected validator set.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

params.attestationRequestFeeToken: The address of the token with which the attestation fee will be paid.
params.attestationsRequested: The number of requested attestations for this request.
params.identifier: The hash of the identifier to be attested.
The identifier for which to revoke.
params.index: The index of the account in the accounts array.

params.identifier: The hash of the identifier to be attested.

params._attestationExpiryBlocks: The new limit on blocks allowed to come between requesting an attestation and completing it.

params.fee: The fee in 'token' that is required for each attestation.

params.registryAddress: The address of a registry contract for routing to other contracts.

params._selectIssuersWaitBlocks: The wait period in blocks to call selectIssuers on attestation                                requests.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

validateAttestationCode(bytes32,address,.details: Throws if there is no matching outstanding attestation request.Throws if the attestation window has passed.

params.identifier: The hash of the identifier to be attested.
params.r: Output value r of the ECDSA signature.
params.s: Output value s of the ECDSA signature.
params.v: The recovery id of the incoming ECDSA signature.

validateAttestationCode(bytes32,address,.return: The issuer of the corresponding attestation.

params.index: Index of requested validator in the validator set as sorted by the election.

validatorAddressFromCurrentSet(uint256).return: Address of validator at the requested index.

withdraw(address).details: Throws if msg.sender does not have any rewards to withdraw.

params.token: The address of the token that will be withdrawn.

batchGetAttestationStats(bytes32[]).notice: Batch lookup function to determine attestation stats for a list of identifiers.

checkProofOfPossession(address,bytes,byt.notice: Checks a BLS proof of possession.

complete(bytes32,uint8,bytes32,bytes32).notice: Submit the secret message sent by the issuer to complete the attestation request.

fractionMulExp(uint256,uint256,uint256,u.notice: calculate a * b^x for fractions a, b to `decimals` precision

getAttestationIssuers(bytes32,address).notice: Returns selected attestation issuers for a identifier/account pair.

getAttestationRequestFee(address).notice: Returns the fee set for a particular token.

getAttestationState(bytes32,address,addr.notice: Returns the state of a specific attestation.

getAttestationStats(bytes32,address).notice: Returns attestation stats for a identifier/account pair.

getCompletableAttestations(bytes32,addre.notice: Returns the state of all attestations that are completable

getEpochSize().notice: Returns the current epoch size in blocks.

getUnselectedRequest(bytes32,address).notice: Returns the unselected attestation request for an identifier/account pair, if any.

numberValidatorsInCurrentSet().notice: Gets the size of the current elected validator set.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

request(bytes32,uint256,address).notice: Commit to the attestation request of a hashed identifier.

revoke(bytes32,uint256).notice: Revokes an account for an identifier.

selectIssuers(bytes32).notice: Selects the issuers for the most recent attestation request.

setAttestationRequestFee(address,uint256.notice: Updates the fee  for a particular token.

setRegistry(address).notice: Updates the address pointing to a Registry contract.

validatorAddressFromCurrentSet(uint256).notice: Gets a validator address from the current validator set.

withdraw(address).notice: Allows issuers to withdraw accumulated attestation rewards.
